links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Vaclav Kotesovec, Graph - the asymptotic ratio
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(binomial(i, 2), j)*b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> b(n$2):seq(a(n), n=0..50);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 03 2013
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i < 1, 0, Sum[Binomial[Binomial[i, 2], j]*b[n-i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]]; a[n_] := b[n, n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 50}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 13 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
